languages.text: "Оно живое... движется, мыслит, пытается говорить с нами, но... не источает цветов! Впервые в жизни я вижу чужую боль и ярость собственными глазами, а не с помощью дара. Так вот каково это..."

"It's alive... it moves, it thinks, it tries to talk to us, but — it exudes no colours! This is the first time I have seen another's pain and fury with my eyes alone, without the aid of my gift. So, this is what it's like..."
languages.original_text: "Оно живое... движется, мыслит, пытается говорить с нами, но... не источает цветов! Впервые в жизни я вижу чужую боль и ярость собственными глазами, а не с помощью дара. Так вот каково это..."

traits.locale_text: "It's alive... it moves, it thinks, it tries to talk to us, but — it exudes no colours! This is the first time I have ever seen someone else's pain and fury with my eyes alone, without the aid of my gift. So this is what it's like..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's alive... it moves, it thinks, it tries to talk to us, but — it exudes no colours! This is the first time I have ever seen someone else's pain and fury with my eyes alone, without the aid of my gift. So this is what it's like..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's alive... it moves, it thinks, it tries to talk to us, but — it exudes no colours! This is the first time I see someone else's pain and fury with my very eyes, without the aid of my gift. So, this is what it's like..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's alive... it moves, it thinks, it tries to talk to us, but — it exudes no colours! This is the first time I see someone else's pain and fury with my very eyes, without the aid of my gift. So, this is what it's like..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's alive... it moves, it thinks, it tries to talk to us, but — it exudes no colours! This is the first time I have seen another's pain and fury with my eyes alone, without the aid of my gift. So, this is what it's like..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's alive... it moves, it thinks, it tries to talk to us, but — it exudes no colours! This is the first time I have seen another's pain and fury with my eyes alone, without the aid of my gift. So, this is what it's like..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Está vivo... se mueve, piensa, intenta hablar, pero... ¡no desprende colores! Es la primera vez que veo el dolor y la furia de alguien solo con mis propios ojos, sin el beneficio de mi don. Así que así se ve...».
languages.original_text: "It's alive... it moves, it thinks, it tries to talk to us, but — it exudes no colours! This is the first time I have seen another's pain and fury with my eyes alone, without the aid of my gift. So, this is what it's like..."

traits.locale_text: «Está vivo... se mueve, piensa, intenta hablar, pero... ¡no desprende colores! Es la primera vez que veo el dolor y la furia de alguien con mis propios ojos, sin mi don. Así que así se ve...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Il est en vie... Il bouge, il pense, il essaie de nous parler, mais... aucune couleur n'émane de lui ! C'est la première fois que je vois la douleur et la rage de quelqu'un de mes propres yeux, sans l'aide de mon pouvoir. C'est donc à ça que ça ressemble... »
languages.original_text: "It's alive... it moves, it thinks, it tries to talk to us, but — it exudes no colours! This is the first time I have seen another's pain and fury with my eyes alone, without the aid of my gift. So, this is what it's like..."

traits.locale_text: « Il est en vie... Il bouge, il pense, il essaie de nous parler, mais... aucune couleur n'émane de lui ! C'est la première fois que je vois la douleur et la rage de quelqu'un de mes propres yeux, sans l'aide de mon pouvoir. C'est donc à ça que ça ressemble... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「生きていて、動いて、思考して、あたくしたちに話しかけようとしてるのに…色を全く発していないんです！能力に頼らず、誰かの痛みと怒りをこの目で見るのは初めてです。そう、これはまるで…」
languages.original_text: "It's alive... it moves, it thinks, it tries to talk to us, but — it exudes no colours! This is the first time I have seen another's pain and fury with my eyes alone, without the aid of my gift. So, this is what it's like..."

traits.locale_text: 「生きていて、動いて、思考して、あたくしたちに話しかけようとしてるのに…色を全く発していないんです！能力に頼らず、誰かの痛みと怒りをこの目で見るのは初めてです。そう、これはまるで…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “它是活的……它会动，会思考，会试图与我们交谈，但是……它却不会散发任何色彩！这还是我第一次不依靠任何力量的情况下，靠肉眼看到别人的痛苦和愤怒。原来它就是这个样子……”
languages.original_text: "It's alive... it moves, it thinks, it tries to talk to us, but — it exudes no colours! This is the first time I have seen another's pain and fury with my eyes alone, without the aid of my gift. So, this is what it's like..."

traits.locale_text: “它是活的……它会动，会思考，会试图与我们交谈，但是……它却不会散发任何色彩！这还是我第一次不依靠任何力量的情况下，亲眼看到别人的痛苦和愤怒。原来它就是这个样子……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Er lebt ... er bewegt sich, er denkt, er versucht, mit uns zu sprechen, aber ... er sondert keine Farben ab! Das ist das erste Mal, dass ich den Schmerz und Zorn eines anderen allein mit meinen Augen sehe, ohne die Hilfe meiner Gabe. So ist das also ..."
languages.original_text: "It's alive... it moves, it thinks, it tries to talk to us, but — it exudes no colours! This is the first time I have seen another's pain and fury with my eyes alone, without the aid of my gift. So, this is what it's like..."

traits.locale_text: "Er lebt ... er bewegt sich, er denkt, er versucht, mit uns zu sprechen, aber ... er sondert keine Farben ab! Das ist das erste Mal, dass ich den Schmerz und Zorn eines anderen mit meinen eigenen Augen sehe, ohne die Hilfe meiner Gabe. So ist das also ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hayatta, hareket ediyor, düşünüyor, bizimle konuşmaya çalışıyor ama... Hiç renk yaymıyor! Daha önce hediyemin yardımı olmadan birinin acısına ve öfkesine sadece gözlerimle şahit olmamıştım. Demek böyle bir şeymiş..."
languages.original_text: "It's alive... it moves, it thinks, it tries to talk to us, but — it exudes no colours! This is the first time I have seen another's pain and fury with my eyes alone, without the aid of my gift. So, this is what it's like..."
